attributes.action: Stop deducting Income Tax  for ALL service personnel currently on active service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our government is one of the few who continue to tax on income our service personnel when they are on active service. This is an appalling affront to human and common decency. Our forces don’t mind putting their lives on the line to back up where the politicians have failed but to tax them as they are being shot at and killed is fundamentally wrong. Time to stop this!
